name: Hitting Close to Home
description:
You play as Finn, a 13-year-old boy, who finds an escape from his sad existence via an old computer his friend gives him.

Hitting Close to Home is a dark story-driven platformer made for Dani's Basement Jam #2

Controls -

Space - Jump/Jetpack.

Mouse 1 - Fire/Next Dialogue

WASD - Movement.

I, unfortunately, couldn't finish as much as I wanted so the game ends abruptly. For my first game jam, I am proud that I managed to "Finished"
